New Records: Indonesia secured their first win against Vietnam in the national team level since 2016.
Vietnam became the first team to be eliminated from the 2023 AFC Asian Cup after two losses.
Key Match Events: Indonesia scored a penalty goal in the 42nd minute after Nguyen Thanh Binh was involved in a shirt pull.
Vietnam's Le Pham Thanh Long received a second yellow card and was sent off in stoppage time.
Pre-Game Insights: Vietnam's head coach Philippe Troussier had expected a 'balanced battle' but the match turned out to be a tough challenge for Vietnam.
Indonesia's robust defense hindered Vietnam's offensive efforts.
Post-Match Reflections: Vietnamese players expressed disappointment following the loss.
Indonesia's victory propelled them to third place in Group D, while Vietnam's elimination ended their tournament journey.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the 2023 AFC Asian Cup, which featured 24 teams competing in six groups.
Vietnam's elimination meant they would not advance to the Round of 16.
